pages.text: Welcome to Adventure Maps, Mine and Slash's End-Game Content! Maps are basically items that when used in a Map Device, spawn a temporary dimension where you can fight stronger mobs, get better items, currency and even get Unique items!

Maps are separated by tiers, each tier makes mobs a bit more difficult. The higher tier you progress to the more Unique items and Currency Items you can get from drops. Some are locked behind high tier maps!
